name: Glow Elixir
description: A radiance-boosting face wash infused with Vitamin C and papaya extract. Gently exfoliates, evens skin tone, and revives dull skin for a fresh, glowing complexion. Perfect for those looking to brighten their skin and fade dark spots naturally.

additional information.PRODUCT INFO:
• Key Ingredients: Vitamin C & Papaya Extract
  • Skin Type: Dull & Uneven Skin Tone
  • Texture: Refreshing Gel
  • Size: 250ml
additional information.RETURN & REFUND POLICY:
• Returns: Products can be returned within 7 days of delivery if unused and unopened.
  • Refunds: Refunds will be processed after a quality check of the returned product, typically within 5-7 business days.
  • Exchange: If you receive a damaged or incorrect item, contact us within 48 hours for a replacement.
additional information.SHIPPING INFO:
• Processing Time: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days.
  • Delivery Time: Standard shipping takes 4-7 business days, express shipping available in 2-4 business days.
  • Shipping Charges: Free shipping on orders above ₹999. Standard charges apply for lower orders.
